item.title: Remarks by |han≠kass'o on the preceding story (The death of the !kau)
item.summary: |han≠kass'o remarks on the story 'The death of the !kau' (kochelman, or Agama lizard): he says that the !khau had been on his way to the red sandhills because he wanted to live near to the shallow pools (called !kaugen |ka |ka) found there.
item.comments: 1) pp.7209v-7212v: see How |han≠kass'o's pet leveret was killed, 2) See also The death of the !kau (a lizard of the genus Agama), 3) This story is found in Book VIII-14
